patthana22.12:1.1_0: Nakusalaṁ napariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.12:1.1_1: Naakusalaṁ napariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.12:1.1_2: Naabyākataṁ napariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.12:2.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naapariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo apariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.12:2.1_1: Nakusalaṁ naapariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā abyākato apariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
